name: Martin
description: * a frontend developer based in Budapest.
readme_text: I'm a '90s kid at heart. Bringing the nostalgia of late-night MSN chats and Super Mario adventures into my designs. I have a son, a wife and two cats. Together, we make life an exciting journey.
NASA_APOD:
NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day. 

This is one of my favorite projects from my Codecool training, reimagined in React, and deployed on Firebase. 

Let's explore the ü™ê universe together.
Portfolio: My portfolio website showcasing my skills and projects. It features a completely unique design tailored to reflect my personality and creativity.
SmellGo_hu:
SmellGo is an online shop offering custom car air fresheners built on Shopify. 

The website allows users to create personalized air fresheners using their own photos and premium quality perfumes. The project features unique solutions such as handling and editing photo uploads. 

You might recognize it from the show ü¶à'Shark Tank Hungary'.
Viverte_com:
Viverte offers a personalized jewelry üíç design experience through their Shopify-based platform.  

Users can collaborate with expert designers to create bespoke pieces, using high-quality materials tailored to their preferences.  

The project integrates a sleek, user-friendly design interface, allowing customers to preview and adjust their designs before finalizing.
Weather_App:
A minimalist üåû Weather App utilizing the OpenWeather API for streamlined and accurate weather information. 

Dynamically fetches weather data based on your location, providing real-time updates. 

Try it now and stay informed with ease!
